step.cmd: On the Palette menu, click the Parallel Merge special gateway.
In the Editor area, click within a Pool where you want to place the gateway.
step.stepresult: The gateway is added to the diagram.

step.cmd: In the Properties view pane, complete all fields (mandatory fields are indicated with an asterisk).
step.info: For more information about how to complete this segment, see section Parallel Merge Gateway properties.

step.cmd: On the menu bar, click File Save . Alternatively, on the toolbar, you can click .
step.stepresult: The gateway and its properties are saved.
